getFaultTolerantTimer

public FaultTolerantTimer getFaultTolerantTimer()
Description copied from interface: FaultTolerantResourceAdaptorContext
Retrieves the RA Entity fault tolerant timer, which may be used to schedule the execution of fault tolerant timer tasks.

Each RA Entity has a single fault tolerant timer.

Specified by:
